StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetMaster8412DataLog]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@FileName varchar(250) = NULL AS
--- GET DATA FOR THE LAST UPLOAD SELECT L.MASTER_8412_DATA_LOG_ID, S.FILE_STATUS, L.USER_LOGIN, CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), L.UPDATE_DATE, 120) AS UPDATE_DATE, L.[FILE_NAME] FROM MASTER_8412_DATA_LOG L INNER JOIN MASTER_8412_DATA_FILE_STATUS S ON (L.[FILE_NAME] = COALESCE(@FileName, L.[FILE_NAME]) AND L.FILE_STATUS_ID = S.MCD_MASTER_DATA_FILE_STATUS_ID AND L.MASTER_8412_DATA_LOG_ID = (SELECT MAX(L1.MASTER_8412_DATA_LOG_ID) FROM MASTER_8412_DATA_LOG L1 WHERE L1.[FILE_NAME] = L.[FILE_NAME]))
